sqlMap.update:
update B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION
SERVICE_NO = #serviceNo:DECIMAL#
APPLICATION_NO = #applicationNo:VARCHAR#
POLICY_NO = #policyNo:VARCHAR#
LICENSE_PLATE_NO = #licensePlateNo:VARCHAR#
CHASSIS_NO = #chassisNo:VARCHAR#

QUOTE_CAR_TYPE = #quoteCarType:VARCHAR#, CHANNEL_DISTRIBUTE = #channelDistribute:VARCHAR#, CHANNEL_NAME = #channelName:VARCHAR#, OPERATOR_PHONE = #operatorPhone:VARCHAR#, POLICY_CREATE_DATE = #commisionamntVci:DECIMAL#, COMMISIONAMNT_TCI = #commisionamntTci:DECIMAL#, MANAGEMENTFEE_VCI = #managementfeeVci:DECIMAL#, MANAGEMENTFEE_TCI = #managementfeeTci:DECIMAL#, NCL_USER_CODE = #nclUserCode:VARCHAR#, MACHINECODE = #machinecode:VARCHAR#, MACHINECODE_STATUS = #machinecodeStatus:VARCHAR#, SALER_ORGANIZATION_NAME = #salerOrganizationName:VARCHAR#, SALER_ORGANIZATION_PHONE = #salerOrganizationPhone:VARCHAR#, APPLYMESSAGEDATE = #applymessagedate:TIMESTAMP#, PROPOSAL_DATE = #proposalDate:TIMESTAMP#, HUATAI_PAYMENT_STATUS = #huataiPaymentStatus:VARCHAR#, T_APPLICATION_NO = #tApplicationNo:VARCHAR#, T_POLICY_NO = #tPolicyNo:VARCHAR#, NEWCORE_FLAG = #newcoreFlag:VARCHAR#, SERIAL_NUMBER = #serialNumber:VARCHAR#, HUATAI_PAYMENT_STATUS_NAME = #huataiPaymentStatusName:VARCHAR#, SUMINSURED_E = #suminsuredE:DECIMAL#, SUMPREMIUM_E = #sumpremiumE:DECIMAL#, SERVICE_CODE_JQ = #serviceCodeJq:VARCHAR#, SERVICE_CODE_SY = #serviceCodeSy:VARCHAR#, BTB_CHANNEL_E_NAME = #btbChannelEName:VARCHAR#, REL_CHANNLE_E_NAME = #relChannleEName:VARCHAR#, INS_AREA_CODE = #insAreaCode:VARCHAR#, BUSINESS_ID = #businessId:DECIMAL# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select:
select * from ( SELECT T.ID id, T.STATUS STATUS, T.LICENSE_PLATE_NO LICENSE_NO, TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, T.APPLICATION_NO APPLICATION_NO, T.POLICY_NO POLICY_NO, T.NEWCORE_FLAG NEWCORE_FLAG, T.EFFECT_DATE EFFECT_DATE, TO_CHAR(T.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') OPERATE_DATE, TC.ORDER_NO PAY_APPLY_NO, TC.IDENTITY_CODE IDENTITY_CODE, TD.SUM_PREMIUM SUM_PREMIUM, TD.SUM_TAX SUM_TAX, T.RISK_CODE RISK_CODE, T.JOINT_SALES JOINT_SALES, T.APPLICATION_NO_E APPLICATION_NO_E, T.POLICY_NO_E POLICY_NO_E, CASE WHEN T.JOINT_SALES='1' AND T.FORMULA_CODE IS NOT NULL AND T.SUM_PREMIUM_CAR_AND_E IS NOT NULL THEN T.SUM_PREMIUM_CAR_AND_E-NVL(TD.SUM_PREMIUM,0)-NVL(TD.SUM_TAX,0) ELSE NULL END PREMIUM_E, TE.APPLICATION_NO YEJ_APPLICATION_NO, TE.POLICY_NO YEJ_POLICY_NO, TE.PREMIUM YEJ_PREMIUM, TE1.APPLICATION_NO WAE_APPLICATION_NO, TE1.POLICY_NO WAE_POLICY_NO, TE1.PREMIUM WAE_PREMIUM, TB.NAME INSURED_NAME, T.CHANNEL_CODE CHANNEL_CODE, T.AGENT_CODE AGENT_CODE, T.IS_SUCCESS IS_SUCCESS, T.COM_CODE COM_CODE, TB.INSURED_NATURE, TF.INSURED_NATURE APPLIYINSURED_NATURE, TB.IDENTITY_TYPE, TF.IDENTITY_TYPE APPLIYIDENTITY_TYPE, T.INSURANCE_CODE, V.CAR_OWNER_FLAG, V.USE_NATURE_CODE, V.CAR_KIND_CODE, V.SEAT_COUNT, V.CAR_OWNER, T.APPLYMESSAGEDATE, T.ELECTRONIC_INSURANCE, T.MACHINECODE_STATUS MACHINECODE_STATUS, T.COMMISIONAMNT_VCI COMMISIONAMNT_VCI, T.COMMISIONAMNT_TCI COMMISIONAMNT_TCI, T.MANAGEMENTFEE_VCI MANAGEMENTFEE_VCI, T.MANAGEMENTFEE_TCI MANAGEMENTFEE_TCI, T.PROJECT_SERIAL_NO, T.HUATAI_PAYMENT_STATUS, T.HUATAI_PAYMENT_STATUS_NAME
NVL((SELECT sum(KD.PREMIUM) FROM B2BBUSI.T_KIND KD WHERE KD.QUOTE_PRICE_INFO_ID = TD.ID AND KD.KIND_CODE in ('BZ','C100120')),0) as PREMIUM_TCI, NVL((SELECT sum(KD.PREMIUM) FROM B2BBUSI.T_KIND KD WHERE KD.QUOTE_PRICE_INFO_ID = TD.ID AND KD.KIND_CODE not in ('BZ','C100120')),0) as PREMIUM_VCI
T.TNI_PREMIUM_CI PREMIUM_TCI, T.TNI_PREMIUM_BI PREMIUM_VCI
FROM B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_ORDER TA ON T.INSURANCE_ORDER_ID=TA.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURED TB ON T.INSURED_ID=TB.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_VEHICLE V ON T.VEHICLE_ID=V.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_ORDER TC ON T.ORDER_ID=TC.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_QUOTE_PRICE_INFO TD ON T.QUOTE_PRICE_INFO_ID=TD.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION_NEW TE ON (T.ID=TE.INSURANCE_APPLICATION_ID AND TE.RISK_CODE='YEJ') LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION_NEW TE1 ON (T.ID=TE1.INSURANCE_APPLICATION_ID AND TE1.RISK_CODE='WAE') LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_APPLICANT TF ON T.APPLICANT_ID=TF.ID where (substr(TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO, 0, 1)='M' OR (substr(TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO, 0, 1)='S' AND T.STATUS in ('4','5','6','7'))) AND T.STATUS <> '8'
T.OPERATOR_NO = #operatorEmpno#
T.LICENSE_PLATE_NO = #licenseNo#
T.STATUS = #status#
T.CREATE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
T.CREATE_DATE <= TO_DATE(#endDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
T.EFFECT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#minStartDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
T.EFFECT_DATE <= TO_DATE(#maxStartDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
T.POLICY_NO = #policyNo#
T.RISK_CODE = #quotationMode#
TF.NAME = #applicantName#
to_char(T.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm') = #currentDate#
T.PLATFORM_FLAG = #platformFlag#
T.NCL_USER_CODE = #nclUserCode#
order by T.CREATE_DATE desc,TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO desc) where rownum<=200

select T.* from b2bbusi.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T left join b2bbusi.T_INSURANCE_ORDER TA on T.INSURANCE_ORDER_ID=TA.ID
TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO=#orderNo#
T.APPLICATION_NO=#proposalNo#
T.POLICY_NO=#policyNo#
T.RISK_CODE=#riskCode#
T.OPERATOR_NO = #userCode#
T.NCL_USER_CODE = #nclUserCode#

SELECT T.ELECTRONIC_INSURANCE , TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, TB.INSURED_NATURE , TF.INSURED_NATURE APPLIYINSURED_NATURE , T.OPERATOR_NO OPERATOR_NO, T.CHANNEL_CODE CHANNEL_CODE, A.QUERY_SEQUENCE_NO, A.QUERY_SEQUENCE_BZ_NO, T.APPLICATION_NO APPLICATION_NO, TB.NAME INSURED_NAME , TF.NAME APPLI_NAME, TB.IDENTITY_TYPE, TF.IDENTITY_TYPE APPLY_IDENTITY_TYPE, TB.IDENTITY_NO, TF.IDENTITY_NO APPLY_IDENTITY_NO, TB.PHONE, TF.PHONE APPLY_PHONE, TB.INSURED_NATION, TF.APP_NATION APP_NATION, TB.SEX, TF.SEX APPLY_SEX , TO_CHAR(TB.BIRTH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BIRTH_DATE , TO_CHAR(TF.BIRTH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') APPLY_BIRTH_DATE, TB.INSURED_IDENTIFY_COM , TF.APP_IDENTIFY_COM APP_IDENTIFY_COM, TB.INS_CERTIFICATE_START_DATE, TF.APP_CERTIFICATE_START_DATE APP_CERTIFICATE_START_DATE , TB.INS_CERTIFICATE_END_DATE , TF.APP_CERTIFICATE_END_DATE APP_CERTIFICATE_END_DATE , TB.ADDRESS, TF.ADDRESS APPLY_ADDRESS, T.MACHINECODE, T.MAKE_COM, T.RISK_CODE RISK_CODE, T.MACHINECODE_STATUS MACHINECODE_STATUS, T.COM_CODE COM_CODE, V.CAR_APPLI_RELATION, V.CARINSURE_DRELATION FROM B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_ORDER TA ON T.INSURANCE_ORDER_ID=TA.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURED TB ON T.INSURED_ID=TB.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_APPLICANT TF ON T.APPLICANT_ID=TF.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_QUOTE_PRICE_INFO A ON T.QUOTE_PRICE_INFO_ID=A.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_VEHICLE V ON T.VEHICLE_ID=V.ID
T.RISK_CODE = #riskCode#
TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO=#orderNo#
T.APPLICATION_NO=#proposalNo#
T.OPERATOR_NO = #operatorEmpno#
select T.* from b2bbusi.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T where T.APPLICATION_NO=#proposalNo#
sqlMap.update: update B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T set T.STATUS ='6' where T.STATUS ='4' and T.ID = #id:DECIMAL#

UPDATE B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T SET T.STATUS = '8'
T.OPERATOR_NO = #operatorNo#
T.NCL_USER_CODE=#nclUserCode#
AND T.ID IN
#idList[]#

update B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T SET MACHINECODE_STATUS = #machinecodeStatus:VARCHAR#, APPLYMESSAGEDATE = SYSDATE
T.RISK_CODE = #riskCode#
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_ORDER TA WHERE TA.ID=T.INSURANCE_ORDER_ID AND TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO=#orderNo#)
T.APPLICATION_NO=#applicationNo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT SUM(NVL(S.TOTAL_C1FEE_LIMIT,0)) FROM B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION S,B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_ORDER TIO WHERE S.INSURANCE_ORDER_ID = TIO.ID AND TIO.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO LIKE 'M%' AND S.CHANNEL_CODE='2401'
AND S.OPERATOR_EMPNO=#handlerCode#
AND S.AGENT_CODE=#agentCode# AND TRUNC(S.POLICY_CREATE_DATE)=TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT TO_CHAR(S.POLICY_CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') policyCreateDate, V.LICENSE_NO licenseNo, V.CAR_OWNER carOwnerName, TO_CHAR(NVL(S.TOTAL_C1FEE_LIMIT,0),'FM9999990.00') planFee FROM B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION S,B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_ORDER TIO,B2BBUSI.T_VEHICLE V WHERE S.INSURANCE_ORDER_ID = TIO.ID AND S.VEHICLE_ID = V.ID AND TIO.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO LIKE 'M%' AND S.CHANNEL_CODE='2401'
AND S.OPERATOR_EMPNO=#handlerCode#
AND S.AGENT_CODE=#agentCode# AND TRUNC(S.POLICY_CREATE_DATE)=TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(TD.SUM_PREMIUM,0) PREMIUM, T.RISK_CODE RISK_CODE, NVL(CASE WHEN T.JOINT_SALES='1' AND T.FORMULA_CODE IS NOT NULL AND T.SUM_PREMIUM_CAR_AND_E IS NOT NULL THEN T.SUM_PREMIUM_CAR_AND_E-NVL(TD.SUM_PREMIUM,0)-NVL(TD.SUM_TAX,0) ELSE NULL END,0) PREMIUM_E, CASE WHEN T.JOINT_SALES='1' AND T.FORMULA_CODE IS NOT NULL AND T.SUM_PREMIUM_CAR_AND_E IS NOT NULL THEN SUBSTR(T.FORMULA_CODE, 0, 3) ELSE '' END RISK_CODE_E, NVL(TE.PREMIUM,0) PREMIUM_Y, TE.RISK_CODE RISK_CODE_Y, TB.CUST_NO CUST_NO, TB.NAME CUST_NAME, TO_CHAR(T.EFFECT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') EFFECT_DATE, T.COM_CODE FROM B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_ORDER TA ON T.INSURANCE_ORDER_ID=TA.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURED TB ON T.INSURED_ID=TB.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_QUOTE_PRICE_INFO TD ON T.QUOTE_PRICE_INFO_ID=TD.ID LEFT JOIN B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION_NEW TE ON (T.ID=TE.INSURANCE_APPLICATION_ID AND TE.RISK_CODE='YEJ') WHERE TA.INSURANCE_ORDER_NO=#orderNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE B2BBUSI.T_INSURANCE_APPLICATION T SET T.HUATAI_PAYMENT_STATUS = #huataiPaymentStatus:VARCHAR#, T.HUATAI_PAYMENT_STATUS_NAME = #huataiPaymentStatusName:VARCHAR# WHERE T.APPLICATION_NO=#applicationNo:VARCHAR#
